name: Substrate must be dry, clean and free of any contaminants.
All overlaps must be a minimum of 80mm on horizontal and vertical seams.
Inside and outside vertical corners should be at minimum 150mm of overlap.
All installation must be with the lower courses lapped under the upper courses.
All air bubbles must be smooth out to ensure full adhesion.
Apply VaproLiqui-Flash evenly at least 50mm onto the face and at least 25mm out along all sides of the penetration.
